name: Tetris-1D
description:
Tetris-1D is a game I made for MiniLD#50, the theme was DEMAKES.

FEATURES:

  • very relaxing gameplay
  • requires high degree of certain skills (like patience and stamina...)
  • highscores!

CONTROLS:

  • Down arrow: make block fall down faster
  • Left/Right arrow: move block left/right
  • Up arrow: rotate block
